fields.name: txtTaxPayerName
fields.title: Name(s) shown on return - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtTaxPayerSSN
fields.title: Your social security number - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtF8917StudFname1
fields.title: Line 1(a). Row 1. Student's First name (as shown on page 1 of your tax return)

fields.name: txtF8917StudSsn1
fields.title: Line 1(b), Row 1. Student's social security number (as shown on page 1 of your tax return)

fields.name: txtF8917StudQualExp1
fields.title: Line 1(c), Row 1. Adjusted qualified expenses (see instructions)

fields.name: txtF8917StudFname2
fields.title: Line 1(a), Row 2. Student's First name (as shown on page 1 of your tax return)

fields.name: txtF8917StudSsn2
fields.title: Line 1(b), Row 2. Student's social security number (as shown on page 1 of your tax return)

fields.name: txtF8917StudQualExp2
fields.title: Line 1(c), Row 2. Adjusted qualified expenses (see instructions)

fields.name: txtF8917StudFname3
fields.title: Line 1(a), Row 3. Student's First name (as shown on page 1 of your tax return)

fields.name: txtF8917StudSsn3
fields.title: Line 1(b), Row 3. Student's social security number (as shown on page 1 of your tax return)

fields.name: txtF8917StudQualExp3
fields.title: Line 1(c), Row 3. Adjusted qualified expenses (see instructions)

fields.name: txtF8917QualExpAmt
fields.title: Line 2. Add the amounts on line 1, column (c), and enter the total - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtF8917F1040TotInc
fields.title: Line 3. Enter the amount from your total income line of Form 1040 or 1040-SR - This field is automatically calculated for you

fields.name: txtF8917F1040TotAdj
fields.title: Line 4. Enter the total of the amounts (Schedule 1. Form 1040 or 1040-SR )plus any write-in adjustments you entered on the dotted line next to Schedule 1 (Form 1040 or 1040-SR)

fields.name: txtF8917SubAmt
fields.title: Line 5. Subtract line 4 from line 3. * If the result is more than $80, 000 ($160, 000 if married filing jointly)

fields.name: txtF8917TuitFeeAmt
fields.title: Line 6. Tuition and fees deduction. Is the amount on line 5 more than $65, 000 - This field is automatically calculated for you
